Name: Aerial Barrage
Desc:
Can be chained with Rising Rush after it launches enemies in the air. Enables you to fly with lightning speed and attack airborne enemies. Can be used after Rising Rush with the Up and Basic Attack keys pressed in order. Perfectly resists Knockback for its duration.
Also, adds the Passive effect that permanently increases Rising Rush damage. Can be chained with Leaf Tornado, Gust Dive, Rolling Moonsault, Spikes Royale, and Wrath of Enreal.
